fixes.name: dep calc 1
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level passthrough of DeptID implemented as a calculated column by directly referencing the column in 'HR Dataset'[DeptID].

fixes.name: dep calc 2
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level multiplication of dep calc 1 and MarriedID implemented as a calculated column; both field references converted to 'HR Dataset'[Column] format.
